Age Line.descricao: Prevents people above or below a certain age from access to a target

Anti-Disapparition Jinx.descricao: Prevents Disapparition within a certain area

Arrow-shooting spell.descricao: Fires arrows from the caster's wand

Avifors Spell.descricao: Transforms the target into a bird.

Badgering.descricao: Turns target human into a badger

Bewitched Snowballs.descricao: Charms snowballs to follow and harass a designated target

Broom jinx.descricao: Makes a broomstick attempt to buck its rider off

Bubble-producing spell.descricao: Creates a stream of non-bursting bubbles

Caterwauling Charm.descricao: Sets off a high-pitched shriek if entered

Cauldron to Sieve.descricao: Turns a cauldron into a sieve

Cauldron to badger.descricao: Transforms a cauldron into a badger.

Cribbing Spell.descricao: Assists the caster in cheating on written papers.

Drought Charm.descricao: Dries up small bodies of water

False memory charm.descricao: Implants a false memory in the victim

Flagrante Curse.descricao: Causes objects to burn on contact

Fur spell.descricao: Causes fur to grow on someone

Hair-thickening Charm.descricao: Causes hair to grow longer and thicker

Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx.descricao: Causes boils to spell "SNEAK" on the face of a traitor

Homonculous Charm.cor_da_luz: it enables to track the movements of every person in the mapped area

Homorphus Charm.descricao: May temporarily change a transformed werewolf back into their human form (according to Gilderoy Lockhart

Horn tongue hex.descricao: Transforms target's tongue into a horn

Horton-Keitch Braking Charm.descricao: Allow broomsticks to brake more easily

Horcrux-making spell.descricao: Prepared a receptacle to become a Horcrux

Hurling Hex.cor_da_luz: possibly causes a broomstick to attempt to hurl its rider off.

Freezing Charm.descricao: Stops movement and actions of the target

Intruder Charm.descricao: Detects intruders and sounds an alarm

Langlock.descricao: Sticks tongue to roof of the mouth

Legilimency Spell.descricao: Lets caster see into the mind of another person

Meteolojinx Recanto.descricao: Causes weather effects caused by incantations to cease

Ministry of Magic Fog.descricao: Produces special fog (for concealment of certain locations)

Orbis Jinx.descricao: Sucks the target into the ground

Patented Daydream Charm.descricao: Makes the user daydream for 30 minutes

Reverse Spell.descricao: Shows the previous spells cast by a wand

Shield Charm.descricao: Reflects spells and blocks physical forces

Protego Diabolica.descricao: Ring of protective black fire that only burns the caster's enemies whilst leaving their allies unharmed

Pus-squirting hex.descricao: Causes yellowish goo to squirt from one's nose

Reverte.descricao: Returns objects to their original positions or states

Reparifarge.descricao: Reverses the effects of an incomplete Transformation spell

Repello Inimicum.descricao: Repels enemies. If used with Protego Maxima and Fianto Duri
Repello Inimicum.cor_da_luz: it disintegrates anything that comes in contact with the barrier.

Revelio Charm.descricao: Reveals secrets about a person or object

Boggart-Banishing Spell.descricao: Turns a Boggart into something amusing

Rose Growth.cor_da_luz: Accelerates the growth of a rosebush

Rowboat spell.descricao: Causes a rowboat to propel itself.

Sea urchin jinx.descricao: Makes tiny spikes erupt all over the victim

Shield penetration spell.descricao: Used to break down magical shields

Sonorous Charm.descricao: Emits a magnified roar from the tip of the wand

Specialis Revelio.descricao: Reveals spells cast on objects or potions

Sponge-Knees Curse.descricao: Causes the target's legs to become spongy

Taboo.cor_da_luz: the caster is alerted and protective enchantments around the speaker are weakened.

Teacup to tortoise.descricao: Transforms a teacup into a tortoise

Teapot to tortoise.descricao: Transforms a teapot into a tortoise

Toenail-growing hex.descricao: Causes its victim's toenails to grow alarmingly fast

Transmogrifian Torture.cor_da_luz: possibly by transfiguring the target to death

Unbreakable Vow.descricao: Magical vow that is fatal if broken

Unsupported flight.descricao: Allows a witch or wizard to fly unaided

Vacuum cleaner spell.descricao: Cleans an object like a vacuum cleaner

Ventus Duo.descricao: Creates a stronger jet of wind compared to Ventus

Verdillious.descricao: Causes the wand tip to burn like a sparkler whilst damaging the foe.

Verdimillious Charm.descricao: Emits green sparks from the wand that can: Do damage to opponents

Verdimillious Duo Spell.descricao: Emits green sparks from the wand that can: Do damage to opponents
